channel.title: How to get pics on post

item.title: How to get pics on post
item.dc:creator: @gho5t gho5t
item.description:
@gho5t wrote:

I posted this on his other topic called “Pics!!!” 2 days ago:

[quote=“gho5t, post:3, topic:81606”]1. Take a screenshot by pushing the “Print Screen|SysRq” button on your keyboard above the “Insert” key (which is above delete)

  1. Open up a photo viewing program such as MS Paint, or Photoshop
    (even Microsoft Word will work.)

  2. Push Ctrl+V to paste the picture. (Or just go up to Edit>paste)

  3. Save the picture to “My Pictures” Or wherever else you would want it.

  4. Go to www.photobucket.com and register.

  5. Upload the picture and get the IMG code

  6. Paste the IMG code into your text, and BAM, You got a picture![/quote]

You cant say that thats a bad explination…

Read full topic

item.title: How to get pics on post
item.dc:creator: @Nwfd1025 Nwfd1025
item.description:
@Nwfd1025 wrote:

When you are ready to take a picture use:

1.Push F9 at the top of the keyboard
2.Go to ImageShack.us -> Click Upload
3.Go to the dropdown menu on the upload screen
4.Click Recent Documents
5.Scroll al lthe way down to the bottem
6.Find something that says “ScreenShots”
7.Find the one that has like screenshot 1 or what ever it says at the bottem of your moparscreen
8.Push Host Image
9.Copy the site they give you the Http://Imageshack
10. Put them in [img][/img] Tags
11. Post in your topic!

Read full topic
